game_description: Reject Humanity, Become Mouse. Run, Jump, CRAWL like a MOUSE, play fun minigames with your friends and explore the backrooms. funny mouse running game with gorilla tag locomotion, lots of fun maps, and minigames you can play around in.
Languages: English, Chinese (China), Chinese (Hong Kong), Chinese (Taiwan), French (Belgium), French (Canada), French (France), Japanese, Spanish (Argentina), Spanish (Chile), Spanish (Colombia), Spanish (Mexico), Spanish (Peru), Spanish (Puerto Rico), Spanish (Spain), Spanish (Venezuela)
